queries.query: -- claim jobs update {schema}Jobs j set claimed_by = @claimed_by, invisible_until = @invisible_until, attempt = attempt + 1 from ( select row_id from {schema}Jobs where scheduled_for <= @now and invisible_until <= @now order by scheduled_for limit 1 ) f where j.row_id = f.row_id and j.invisible_until <= @now returning job_id, payload, attempt;
-- keep job claim update {schema}Jobs set invisible_until = @invisible_until where job_id = @job_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- complete job delete from {schema}Jobs where job_id = @job_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- forget job delete from {schema}Jobs where job_id = @job_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- retry job update {schema}Jobs set claimed_by = null, invisible_until = @invisible_until where job_id = @job_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
